issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body:
+1. Some messages are not necessary to be in INFO level which mess up RM logs. I think we have two options here:
1. Move scheduler log message out of RM logs.
2. Downgrade some scheduler log level from INFO to DEBUG.
How about that we combine two options together ? I think that potentially for all the plugin components in RM, we need to separate their logs from RM logs.

I went through the code path and cleaned up some logs as needed. 

Uploaded a patch to do that.
Instead of removing the logs, change the log level from info to debug ?
The logs I removed are redundant logs with others. Apart from that,  some logs are also moved from info to debug.
